description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. It's a zombie apocalypse horror story, told through arcade style fighting, and cut scenes. Your character wanders the city in search of supplies for her people, using only her massive cleaver. Every place she goes she leaves behind piles filled with hundreds zombie corpses.
